about_the_game:
Love at the Milky Way Diner is a game about cultural exchange through food, building community, and finding love in the process.

200 years after first contact, humanity is still trying to find their  place in a galaxy full of far more advanced and established species.
One such human, our protagonist, has recently been laid off from their corporate job on Mars when news reaches them; their distant aunt Cassiopia has passed away suddenly, and she would like one of her relatives to take over her restaurant on the distant deep space station Hesperides.
The protagonist decides to take a leap of faith. They may have never left their home start system of Helios, but surely there must be something (or maybe someone) better out there waiting for them.
When they reach the station they find themselves welcomed by a vibrant, multi-species community of eccentric individuals who are only too happy to welcome the new owner of their favourite place to eat.


Love at the Milky Way Diner will feature 8 love interests, each with their own routes and stories

200 years after first contact, humanity is still trying to find their  place in a galaxy full of far more advanced and established species.

The protagonist decides to take a leap of faith. They may have never left their home start system of Helios, but surely there must be something (or maybe someone) better out there waiting for them.
When they reach the station they find themselves welcomed by a vibrant, multi-species community of eccentric individuals who are only too happy to welcome the new owner of their favourite place to eat.

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

movies.name: Love at The Milky Way Diner Trailer

name: Love at The Milky Way Diner: Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11

reviews:
“Oh jeez, I cannot wait for the full game. I just finished the demo, and I love it! I do admit that the cooking gave me a little bit of trouble, but I see you've already remedied that for the full release. I forgot to mention, but I love the art style as well, it's very colorful and cute.”
itch.io

“hi !! this game seems super fun so far. it seems like a really cute game!”
itch.io

“Thank-you Emanuelle, what a lovely game. Best of luck with your Kickstarter.”
itch.io
short_description: A LGBT-friendly cozy sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.
